--------------------
Text: Here Comes Peter Cottontail is a 1971 Easter stop motion animated television special produced by Rankin/Bass Productions and based on the 1957 novel "The Easter Bunny That Overslept" by Priscilla and Otto Friedrich.
Triplets:<Here Comes Peter Cottontail
2:
--------------------
Text: Here Comes Peter Cottontail:  The name "Peter Cottontail" comes from a series of books by Thornton W. Burgess (1874–1965), although the special is not based directly on his books.
Triplets:<Thornton W. Burgess
